overview:
Entrepreneur turned cause-minded entrepreneur.

Adam Ross is an entrepreneur whose passion lies at the intersection of technology, marketing and social responsibility. His first venture in social entrepreneurship involved starting First Step Housing, a social enterprise providing permanent supportive housing to homeless men and women. While providing technology consulting strategy to Hands On Network, he saw the extraordinary power that consumers, non-profits and retailers could have acting in concert, resulting in the creation and launch of SocialVest.

degrees.subject: Computer Science
degrees.institution: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
